children.subject: I submitted a completed application for dual degree in LSCS to L&S advisor at the beginning of the semester and got approved (CS BA appeared on my CalCentral) in about ~3 weeks. If you are applying for dual degree you should submit it to L&S advisor. I am not sure about the double major in L&S but you should check with the college advisor whether it should be submitted to L&S for processing the final step.

history.content: I think instructions are on page 1. Did you take the completed packet to L&S?

Submit the packet with the signatures from both advisors to the L&S advising desk in Evans!

It may indeed take several weeks, after the completed packet has been submitted to L&S advisors, for the application to get formally approved. (When I did it, the L&S advisor said that it was a busy time and to expect ~3 weeks, although I think it was actually approved faster.)
Submit the packet with the signatures from both advisors to the L&S advising desk in Evans!

children.subject: Unfortunately, this sounds like it's stuck at your other (unnamed) major, and not CS. Your second major will not be reflected on CalCentral until you have submitted the form to L&S. Without knowing the processes of the other department, I'm unable to advise on how to proceed.

The form has been signed and approved by the head of my department however she left it with the advisor if my major for me to pickup. I’ve come in to try and pick it up from the advisor to Bring it to my l&s advisor but she keeps telling me that she has not had time to take a look at it yet even though the head of the department had already signed it.(My advisor told me that the head of the dept was the one that needed to approve of my double major). I’ve come in once or twice a week for the past 3 weeks or so but she keeps saying that she hasn’t had time to look at it and to come back the following week. I am unsure what to do at this point, should I just keep coming in..? It has already been signed and approved by the head so I am not sure what else needs to be looked at

history.content: Hi, I was accepted into the CS major earlier this semester (I was declared in my other major prior) and had CS advisor approval and signature on my double major application. I have gotten approval from my second major advisor and they have signed the form a few weeks ago but my major on CalCentral still only has my prior major on it. Am i supposed to do anything else now or do I just wait? It's still early but I'm worried about getting priority registration for my CS courses for the fall semester and would rather not need to worry about it.
history.subject: Calcentral Update on Double Major
